p: Hematological changes were detected in some NHP, such as leukocytosis and neutrophilia, but the values returned to a normal pattern in a few days. In addition, not all cynomolgus monkeys experimentally infected in the study of Rockx et al. ( 2020) showed symptoms of the disease, even though the virus was found from nasal swab collections early in the infection, lasting for at least a week. These results may resemble asymptomatic cases observed in humans, which can still participate in viral transmission (Mizumoto, Kagaya, Zarebski, & Chowell,Â 2020).
